Content:: The Brazilian Academy of Sciences (Portuguese: Academia Brasileira de Ciências or ABC) is the national academy of Brazil. It is headquartered in the city of Rio de Janeiro and was founded on May 3, 1916. It publishes a large number of scientific publications, among them the Anais da Academia Brasileira de Ciências [1] (2020 IF 1.280).[2] Source: Brazilian Academy of Sciences ABC has a distinguished array of national and international members, among them: Media related to Academia Brasileira de Ciências at Wikimedia Commons   This article about an organisation in Brazil is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
